cells.content: Soybean, Maize, Cotton, Canola, Squash, Papaya

Source: Clive James, 2005. * 14 biotech mega countries growing 50,000 hectares, or more, of biotech crops Note: All data re hectares are rounded off to the nearest 100,000 hectares and in some cases this leads to insignificant variances. More detailed descriptions of the status of biotech crops in each country are given in the full version of Brief 34.
